comments:
I was doing some non-Help related tasks on my XP machine at home, and I 
noticed the following NPE coming from Help, followed by two other core.runtime 
exceptions resulting from Help plugin being deactivated.  So I will only 
attach the first stack, since it is the reason why the plug-in is deactivated, 
and hence causing the subsequent exceptions:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.WorkbenchHelpPlugin.startup
(WorkbenchHelpPlugin.java:111)

(PluginDescriptor.java:728)

(InternalPlatform.java:867)

org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginDescriptor.internalDoPluginActivation
(PluginDescriptor.java:740)

(PluginDescriptor.java:188)

(PluginClassLoader.java:112)

f(PluginClassLoader.java:185)

(DelegatingURLClassLoader.java:490)

(DelegatingURLClassLoader.java:882)

(PluginDescriptor.java:167)

n(ConfigurationElement.java:103)

(BrowserManager.java:29)

(BrowserManager.java:106)
at org.eclipse.help.internal.HelpSystem.shutdown(HelpSystem.java:151)
at org.eclipse.help.internal.HelpPlugin.shutdown(HelpPlugin.java:94)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry$2.run
(PluginRegistry.java:283)

(InternalPlatform.java:867)
